title: Luxurious Boutique Estate in Southern France’s Saint-Remy-De-Provence with Daily Breakfast & Sparkling Wine
description:
Escape to the South of France with a dreamy boutique stay in the favoured Saint Remy De Provence. This rustic manor house is nestled among seven hectares of picturesque olive groves and pine trees, with sweeping views of Les Alpilles mountain ranges.

Dine on authentic Provencal cuisine at the hotel's gourmet restaurant, explore the quaint village of Les Baux-de-Provence, or take a leisurely stroll through the Van Gogh trail in Saint-Remy-de-Provence, just a short drive from the hotel.

With only 25 rooms and suites, this authentic estate promises quiet luxury in the calming surroundings of inland Provence. Spend your days basking in the sunshine by the hotel pool, or sprawled on the manicured grounds. Explore the historic villages peppered throughout the countryside, and savour the charm of a bygone era with a glass of sparkling wine as the sun sets for the evening.
offer_address: Petite route des Baux, D27 13210, Saint-Rémy-de-Provence, France
